about_the_game:
Story:
Mike Sorris is a 16-year-old high school student. One afternoon, after school, he was ready to go home. A female classmate in the class invited him to visit the village she lived in, but things began to be strange. Mike Sorris realized that the village had been cursed. What he had to do was to find out the truth in the village and leave the village.

Features:
Old and Classic graphics
Break the third wall
Thrilling chase
Contact with the charactors
Suspense plot

Story:
Mike Sorris is a 16-year-old high school student. One afternoon, after school, he was ready to go home. A female classmate in the class invited him to visit the village she lived in, but things began to be strange. Mike Sorris realized that the village had been cursed. What he had to do was to find out the truth in the village and leave the village.

Features:

name: Unsleepable

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 Processor or Above
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or Above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Above
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130 Processor or Above
  • Memory: 2048 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or Above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Audio Device

short_description: "Unsleepable" is a 3D horror game with a suspense story. The main character -- Mike Sorris ,had to find out the truth in this village, and leave the village.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Greek
*languages with full audio support
